website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Pacer Next Excel kicks are all-around comfortable and extended periods on your feet in these won’t result in pained feet. The modern styling is on-trend, and the build is simply excellent.What’s more, they’re true to size and offer a nice fit. They’re just not easily slipped on, but once your feet are in, the shoes are peerless from then on.
pros: Plenty of Puma Pacer Next Excel shoe reviews have users commenting on how comfortable these kicks are
A good number of people have reported how light the Puma Pacer Next Excel sneakers feel
Quality is not an issue when it comes to these Puma shoes according to many consumers
They’re exactly as pictured, others noted
Puma Pacer Next XCel sneakers have beautiful color schemes, some purchasers have mentioned
Belonging to Puma’s low-top sneaker lineup, these shoes have a very current design that you’d be proud to show off, several users have stated
Among Puma’s casual kicks, these are true to size and provide a good fit, a handful of customers claimed
A couple of buyers have described the sneakers as providing excellent value for money
cons: One user says that Puma Pacer Next Excel sneakers can be a little challenging to put on due to the tight opening

customer_reviews.title: These run alittle small.
customer_reviews.text: Get 1/2 to 1 size larger than you think you need. They run small.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Runs Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Shoe looks great and would seem comfy if I could get my foot inside. Shoe seems long enough but absolutely TOO narrow because of the harder casing that surrounds the shoe. So disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Darlena

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes I Own
customer_reviews.text: A lot of the other reviews say these run small but I'd say it's more of a snug fit. I ordered the same size I always do, and while it hugs my feet a little tighter than my shoes typically would it's far more comfortable due to the foam padding the entire inside of the shoe. As far as looks go these shoes are awesome. Very versatile and can be worn anywhere from the gym to a more casual setting. I've gotten tons of compliments on them so far and absolutely love these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Lawson

customer_reviews.title: A little to small
customer_reviews.text: If the shoes were a little more stretchy they would go on easier, but in general they seemed a half size to small. Pumas (that don't have a German or Italian car brands attached to them) usually fit true to size for me, but these did not. Great price, bad fit.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A. Metts

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes.  Bought two pairs. Just one issue though
customer_reviews.text: I bought the grey ones with the mint trim and love them. Also purchased the charcoal colored with the white sole but unfortunately that is not the shoe I received. I do like the shoes I got but they aren't the ones I ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I will not be buying this one again....
customer_reviews.text: It is a hassle to put on and as pretty as the shoe is it is not as comfortable as I expected....
customer_reviews.author: Margs G

customer_reviews.title: Way too narrow, had to return
customer_reviews.text: I always used to get PUMA shoes but this pair and the last ones I got were not very durable and they were really narrow. Not too happy with PUMAs at the moment. Ended up switching to Adidas and have been happy.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Order 1 size up
customer_reviews.text: Like most everyone else say, one size up minimum for these shoes. I usually wear a men's size 12, ordered these in a size 13 and they fit great. Very narrow shoe, but super comfy and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: The Wrights

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair purchased. I love this shoes and they are so comfortable for walking and working out. Also they look so good on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product but if you have a wide foot it’s not gonna work out for you. Maybe by a couple sizes larger.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: The hard plastic that surrounds the foot hole doesn’t give. So you can’t get the shoes on!
customer_reviews.author: van slambrouck

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: I get 1/2 size bigger and love that fit with puma. Excellent bottom grip for running and jumping
customer_reviews.author: Doug HP

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like how comfortable these shoes are. I always buy pumas because they are stylish and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Trey

customer_reviews.title: Very very very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable and great everyday sweat outfit sneaker. The plastic black shell is a little rinky dink and cheap but isn’t that bad.
customer_reviews.author: The swaze

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Not the color pictured. As usual amazon failed to provide adequate customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Matt P

customer_reviews.title: Very hard to put it in.
customer_reviews.text: I m size 10 U.S but the issue with this shoe was that It is very tight to put it in. I m not recommending this shoe. Puma has better shoes but not this one.
customer_reviews.author: Noor

customer_reviews.title: too small mouth
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look amazing, but the mouth of the shoe is too small that I cannot put my foot inside the show, my size is 8 but I bought 8.5 and it was still small
customer_reviews.author: kamal

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Puma shoes always fit perfectly! I wear a 12 and that's what I always buy. The shoes always fit perfectly. Never have to try them on!!
customer_reviews.author: J Duckets

customer_reviews.title: Need Shoe Horn and Jackhammer to get these on.
customer_reviews.text: PUMA must run small, I have Reebok and Nike all in size 12, but these PUMA I could not get my foot inside, I eventually gave up trying.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfect you just have to know the right size. They're very comfortable not only for working out but also for work
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these on July 16 and they already having a hole to wear in the back inside.
customer_reviews.author: George S Tutor

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: They are excellent for work l do a lot of walking and moving around , these are perfect!😊
customer_reviews.author: latrisha Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Color way popped more than expected!
customer_reviews.text: The color way really pops! Puma is also my new favorite shoe. Most comfortable shoe out!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: I would love for you keep selling that same shoe
customer_reviews.text: I love them, they are for me to dress in.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Perfecto
customer_reviews.text: It arrived perfectly and top notch. Am giving a 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Damex

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight slip-on
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very comfortable, but tight. Buy your normal shoe size, but expect them to feel tight. They are slip-ons with laces. Overall, I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: Little bit tight but Puma always runs a little narrow.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

product_meta.title: PUMA Unisex Adults’ Pacer Next Excel Sneaker
product_meta.description: - this progressive street runner silhouette takes a step forward by featuring an air mesh upper for breathability and a TPU cage structure that wraps around the heel for superior support - the midsole is of contemporary design in combination with a soft injected mold eva compound to deliver premium cushioning and a rugged rubber outsole to ensure quality grip and traction - the SoftFoam+ sockliner provides superior cushioning and optimal comfort for every step of your day.
